channel.title: Looking to join a team
channel.description: Hello, I'm looking to join a team which has something to offer me in return for what I offer them(lets be honest, I don't do things out the good of my heart however nobody said it has to be financial;3). My experience with Rsps has been over 3 years, only one year should be counted however as for two years my knowledge was basic at best. My Java knowledge isn't huge, its very small in fact. My strengths are web design(as we all know thats typically easy unless your making scripts for the site) and my logical thought process for idea's to be implemented. My weaknesses is that unless I understand how I'm wrong I'll continue with what I'm doing regardless otherwise unless I'm told how its wrong. My lack of programming skills. I'm learning Java at the moment in my course and I'm about to apply for my next course which is http://www.stevenson.ac.uk/courses/course/hnc-computer-games-development-1213-course?fs=1 so I can only get better which I can provide proof of. I will develop my skills over time, just be patient. If your intrested please do leave a post. I communicate via Msn but I'm willing to use Skype but I don't use it too often.

item.title: Looking to join a team
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

[quote=“Ruby Forums Coder, post:8, topic:436902”]They are scripts, but they work with websites.

I class all website design under website development, hence why I say I’m a website developer other than website designer.[/quote]
I know that there scripts that work with websites thats why I said there scripts and we were talking about websites so thats pretty obvious?
Well you should check the defination of design and development as there two different things although some of the things overlap. Thats like saying doing graphics(including some implementation) and doing programming are the same things?

Read full topic

item.title: Looking to join a team
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

They are scripts, but they work with websites.

I class all website design under website development, hence why I say I’m a website developer other than website designer.

Read full topic

item.title: Looking to join a team
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

@Ruby
jscript et is what I’d classify as scripts also I believe php is a scripting language(I don’t use php but I was told that from a friend thats why I’ve stayed away from it).
Web design and web development are two different things. Design is aimed at aesthetics, development is aimed at development obviously.

Read full topic

item.title: Looking to join a team
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“Kidpaparoach, post:1, topic:436902”]Hello,
I’m looking to join a team which has something to offer me in return for what I offer them(lets be honest, I don’t do things out the good of my heart however nobody said it has to be financial;3).
My experience with Rsps has been over 3 years, only one year should be counted however as for two years my knowledge was basic at best.
My Java knowledge isn’t huge, its very small in fact. My strengths are web design(as we all know thats typically easy unless your making scripts for the site) and my logical thought process for idea’s to be implemented. My weaknesses is that unless I understand how I’m wrong I’ll continue with what I’m doing regardless otherwise unless I’m told how its wrong. My lack of programming skills.
I’m learning Java at the moment in my course and I’m about to apply for my next course which is http://www.stevenson.ac.uk/courses/course/hnc-computer-games-development-1213-course?fs=1 so I can only get better which I can provide proof of.
I will develop my skills over time, just be patient.
If your intrested please do leave a post. I communicate via Msn but I’m willing to use Skype but I don’t use it too often.[/quote]

Website Development is only simple if you’re using something like html.

If you’re going from scratch and creating a good site, you need to make use of jscript or jquery, css and then as an extension of html. If you’re using it as a script then there’s php in there as well, there’s not much simple about Website Development.

Read full topic

item.title: Looking to join a team
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

[quote=“Daginith, post:4, topic:436902”]Be warned, kidpaparoach, superman will rip your head off if you cause the NPCs to be unable to update

OT: good luck on this. :)[/quote]
Ah, ty for the advice. I’llbe sure to take a copy of the file(s) and highlight in red what I do and send him it so he can check it over so he can’t kill me for it;3. Tyfor the gl
Atm I’m reading this http://docs.oracle.com/javase/tutorial/java/javaOO/enum.html and feeling like an idiot cause i’m learning it slowly o.0.

Read full topic

item.title: Looking to join a team
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

imsuperman05:

I’m actually looking for somebody to work on a Hyperion with me, the other members that’s supposed to work with me looked at one file, then didn’t touch it again. If you promise to work non-stop or at least do something productive, you can work with me; i can teach you some bad habits to stay away from, and teach you a lot. I’ve worked on this for around 2 weeks, and I’m getting tired of doing everything myself. Add my msn if you want to join: lazerbike@hotmail.com

Sweet, I’ve never worked on Hyperion so you’ll have to bear with me as I get to grips with it :p. I can promise to do my best, it’ll be productive of course as it’ll be the best that I can do as of that time and I can only get better over time as its in my course and it’ll be in my next course. I’d really like to work with you as I’ve seen some of your work and it looks pretty nice and theres a lot you can teach me. I’ve added your msn(:.

Read full topic
